welome.signIn:
Welcome to your Nuxeo assistant.
You can search for any content from your Nuxeo instance.
welcome.introduction: What can I do for you today?
signedIn.example: For example, you can say "Search for jackets".
signedIn.signInOrQuit: What would you like to do?
signedIn.error: Something went wrong during the sign in process.
search.requiresSignIn: To search for documents I need you to sign in.
search.noResultsFound: Uh oh, I didn't find any document when searching for {{criterion}}.
search.oneResultFound: I found 1 document when searching for {{criterion}}:
search.resultsFound: I found {{count}} documents when searching for {{criterion}}:
searchSelectDocument.select: OK, letâ€™s have a closer look at {{documentTitle}}
searchSelectDocument.error: An error occurred while looking at the document.
smartDisplaySignInOrQuit: It seems like the "Personal results" setting is disabled for this device. To sign in and access your content, this setting needs to be enabled. Would you like to sign in once this setting is enabled?
unexpectedError: I encountered a glitch. Can you please say that again?
